scripts.release:prepare: changelogen && pnpm -r exec cp ../../CHANGELOG.md && bumpp package.json packages/**/package.json
scripts.release:push-tag: PKG_VERSION=$(node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version)") && git add . && git -m "chore(release): Release version ${PKG_VERSION}" && git tag -a "v${PKG_VERSION}" && git push --tags
